#Text=Quick goal sees Bayern advance over Real Madrid
#Text=Wednesday , March 7 , 2007
#Text=Bayern Munich 2(6 ) 1(5 ) Real Madrid
#Text=Match Stats

#Text=Attendance 69500 Goalscorers for Bayern Munich Makaay ( 1 ' ) , Lucio ( 66 ' ) Goalscorers for Real Madrid van Nistelrooy ( 83 ' ) Bookings ( Bayern Munich ) van Bommel , Podolski ( Yellow ( 3 ) ) , van Bommel ( Red ( 1 ) ) Bookings ( Real Madrid ) Ramos , Guti , Diarra ( Yellow ( 4 ) ) , Diarra ( Red ( 1 ) )
#Text=Bayern Munich hosted Real Madrid at the Allianz Arena today in the second leg of the Champions League round of sixteen .
#Text=The first leg saw Real coming out on top 3-2 , but the two away goals by Bayern gave them a good chance in the second leg .
#Text=Madrid were without David Beckham for the game , who orchestrated all 3 goals in the first leg , and he was replaced in the midfield by Raúl .
#Text=Bayern played a strong side , with Lucas Podolski and Roy Makaay in attack , and Owen Hargreaves in the midfield .
#Text=Any plans Real had made for the game went immediately out the window when Roy Makaay scored the fastest ever goal in a Champions League match after only 10 seconds .
#Text=Real took the kickoff , and Roberto Carlos was immediately dispossessed by Salihamidzic , who passed in the ball to Makaay .
#Text=The German striker neatly finished passed Iker Casillas to stun the Galacticos , and give the home side the lead .
#Text=Bayern continued to press , and Real looked listless , as shots from Podolski and Makaay were saved by Casillas .
#Text=Real coach Fabio Capello was quick to make changes in his team , and sent on Guti in place of Emerson .
#Text=Casillas was again forced into action as van Buyten headed Sagnol 's free kick towards the goal , but the keeper got down well to make the stop .
#Text=Madrid finally began to play like a team , and substitute Guti had a chance after a neat backheel by Higuain found him , but the shot flew wide .
#Text=Real continued pressing , and Dutchman Ruud van Nistelrooy headed a ball towards the net , but Oliver Kahn was easily able to cope with the low power effort .
#Text=Raúl then struck an acrobatic effort towards the goal , but found only the side netting .
#Text=After the restart , Real looked shaky at the back again as van Bommel found his way in on goal , but Casillas was again on hand to snuff out the danger .
#Text=Oliver Kahn was then forced into action at the other end , as he pushed out a van Nistelrooy header off of a cross by Raúl .
#Text=Bayern had a penalty claim , but were denied by referee Lubos Michel .
#Text=It did n't matter however , and the resulting corner was met by Lucio 's head , doubling Bayerns lead .
#Text=Bayern had another chance minutes later , but a open header by Salihamidzic went wide .
#Text=Raúl then had a chance for Real , but his header was directed straight to Kahn .
#Text=Ruud van Nistelrooy was then denied a run on goal after a mistaken offside call was given by the linesman .
#Text=On 80 minutes , Robinho was hauled down by van Bommel in the penalty area , and Real was awarded a penalty .
#Text=Marco van Bommel was consequently given his second yellow of the match for arguing the point , and was sent off along with Diarra of Real for his part in the confrontation .
#Text=Once everything settled , van Nistelrooy stepped up to the spot and sent the ball into the net , cutting the lead in half , but still leaving Real behind on aggregate .
#Text=The game finished dramatically , as Ramos thought he had scored to tie the game , but the referee correctly judged that a hand had been used in the build up , and the goal was not counted .
#Text=The game ended in a win for Bayern , and they will go on to the next round , while Real is left to focus on domestic play .
